name: Wireless Tankery
description:
Wireless Tankery Control your way through a tank drone infested city.

Take out the relays to turn off the control to the enemy tanks and save the city.

Movement = WASD Mouse = Aim and fire cannon You must look for control points to capture; there are four in total. Once you arrive on a control point, enemies will know you are capturing the point and may send reinforcements. Watch out! 

Made For the Tig Jam 3! Created by

Alecson Liang - Programmer
Brodie James-Brown - Map Design
Joshua Parmenter - 3D Model and Splash Artist

Assets Used

Jacaranda Tree - Rico Cilliers
Fern 02 - Rico Cilliers
Aerial Grass Rock Texture - Rob Tuytel
